body:
Vincent. Are you using a grid or point attributes on surfaces?  .ok
and .da files will only work on a grid. Point attributes needs a bit
of a workaround but can be done.



On 12 May 2009, at 03:18, "vincent" <vincent0039@gmail.com> wrote:
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] problem with import Radiance resutlt to ECOTECT
subject: [Radiance-general] problem with import Radiance resutlt to ECOTECT
